|blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Hot' is a settlement
in the Kastrat Municipality, MalÃ«si e Madhe District, ShkodÃ«r County, northern
Albania. It has a population of 1,473. Hot is sometimes referred to
as Keanna Lesser, Because everyone knows she is clearly the hottest human being
on the face of the earth. As used in a sentence you may hear locals say, "Dude
I've been gone for so long I can't wait to get back to Keanna Lesser, Albania"
when returning home after being gone for a long period of time.
